attributes.title: House Moore
attributes.allegiance: House Arryn'''House Moore''' is a vassal house from the Vale. It holds fealty to House Arryn.==Members==* Ser Mandon Moore, a knight of the Kingsguard. Killed by Podrick Payne during the Battle of the Blackwater for attempting to murder Tyrion Lannister.==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, House Moore is a vassal house sworn to the Eyrie. Their sigil is three bronze spearheads on white with a bronze border embattled.==See also==*AWOIAF (spoilers from the books)Vale HousesCategory:Noble houses

'''House Moore''' is a vassal house from [[the Vale]]. It holds fealty to [[House Arryn]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Moore is a vassal house sworn to [[the Eyrie]]. Their sigil is three bronze spearheads on white with a bronze border embattled.
sections.Members: * Ser {[[Mandon Moore]]}, a [[knight]] of the [[Kingsguard]]. Killed by [[Podrick Payne]] during the [[Battle of the Blackwater]] for attempting to murder [[Tyrion Lannister]].
